short_summary: the work involves the reconstruction of a portion of a marginal wharf at Lushes Bight, NL
description: The work covered consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for the reconstruction of a portion of the marginal wharf at Lushes Bight, NL  in strict accordance with specifications and accompanying drawings and subject to all terms and conditions of the Contract The work consists of site work including mobilization, demobilization, excavation, demolition, hauling, and disposal offsite and onsite Required survey to set location of new work as indicated on the drawinThe work includes the construction of timber cribwork, fendering, wheelguard and blocking, Type B1 mooring cleats and ladders The work includes the construction of temporary works as required to ensure the stability of adjacent Harbour Authority Building foundations during the reconstruction of the section of marginal wharf The work includes the construction of works as necessary to maintain the section of existing native timber marginal wharf which is to remain The work includes the supply and placement of scour protection The work includes the construction of reinforced concrete wharf deck slab The work includes the supply and placement of new Class A granular material
tags: Infrastructure, Construction, Contract Management, Canada, Newfoundland
